title: The Stanley, Historic Pasadena Apt in Old Town
app_fee: App fee $25.00 for credit check – 720+ credit score required
posting_body: ['The Stanley, Historic Pasadena Apt in Old Town', 'Property Address', '149 S Los Robles Ave # 201 | Pasadena, CA 91101', 'Available: Now', 'Offered By', 'SGV Management, LLC', 'Description', 'INCREDIBLE Old Town Pasadena location', 'STUDIO, 1 bathroom apartment', 'LOADED with character, exposed red brick, old-world charm', 'COMPLETELY NEW kitchen w/ stainless steel stove, stainless microhood and stainless refrigerator', 'COMPLETLEY NEW bathroom including tub, tile flooring, tile walls, pedestal sink, etc.', 'NEW Dual-Zone mini-split air conditioning and heating for maximum year-round comfort', 'REFINISHED - Original oak hardwood floors', 'Ground-level unit', 'Card-operated community laundry room', '94 Walk Score – A “Walkers Paradise”', 'Water, gas and trash paid by ownership', 'One covered controlled-access parking space is included as a leasing concession for the first year only', 'The Stanley was designed by famous architect Myron Hunt, who also designed other enduring masterpieces including the Rose Bowl, Pasadena Central Library, Huntington Hotel, Huntington Library, and Occidental College, among others', 'Across the street from Kaiser Permanente School of Medicine or a short distance to Paseo Colorado, Central Park, Pasadena Civic Auditorium, Pasadena Playhouse, Rose Bowl, Pasadena Central Library, Brookside & Arroyo golf courses, Huntington Hospital, Pasadena City College, Cal Tech, Art Center College of Design South Campus, Memorial Park Rail Station', 'Smoke / Vape / Tobacco-free property', 'Sorry!', 'No dogs allowed', 'One indoor cat allowed with additional pet deposit', 'A 720 OR HIGHER CREDIT SCORE IS REQUIRED FOR EACH ADULT', 'TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING CALL:', 'show contact info', 'OR VISIT: <URL>', '149 S. Los Robles Ave., Pasadena, CA 91101', 'Apartment # 201', 'One (1) year lease required with security deposit', 'We manage several other Pasadena properties.', 'If this unit isn’t quite what you’re looking for, inquire about other availabilities!', 'Avoid Scammers!', 'SGV Management, LLC only accepts', 'online applications and online payment through our website', 'or by cashiers check at our office at 133 E Duarte Rd in Arcadia', 'Find an Apartment - Book a Viewing - Apply Online at:', '<URL>', 'Rental Terms', 'Lease: One year', 'Rent: $2,550.00', 'Available: Now', 'Application Fee: $25.00', 'Security Deposit: $2,000.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs not allowed']
